SEARCH
Package Medicine

Class MedicineUI

java.lang.Object
Medicine.Medicine
Medicine.MedicineUI
public class MedicineUI extends Medicine
The MedicineUI class provides a user interface for managing and interacting with the medicine data. It includes functionalities to display all medicines, add new medicines, update stock levels, remove medicines, and manage low stock alerts.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • displayAllMedicines

      public void displayAllMedicines()
      Displays all medicines in a formatted list with details such as medicine name, initial stock, and low stock alert level.

    • updateStock

      public void updateStock(String name, int changeAmount)
      Updates the stock level of a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to update
      changeAmount - the amount by which to change the stock level (positive to increase, negative to decrease)

    • addNewMedicine

      public void addNewMedicine()
      Adds a new medicine to the database. Prompts the user for details such as medicine name, stock level, and low stock alert level.

    • displayOneMedicine

      public void displayOneMedicine(String name)
      Displays information about a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to display

    • print

      public void print(Medicine med)
      Prints the details of a medicine object.
      Parameters:
      med - the Medicine object to print

    • updateLowStockLevelAlert

      public boolean updateLowStockLevelAlert(String name, int newLowStockLevel)
      Updates the low stock level alert for a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to update
      newLowStockLevel - the new low stock level alert to set
      Returns:
      true if the low stock alert level was successfully updated, false if the medicine was not found

    • removeMedicine

      public void removeMedicine(String name)
      Removes a medicine from the database by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to remove

    • print

      public void print(String s)
      Prints a message to the console.
      Parameters:
      s - the message to print
